Two individuals, both in white shirts, appear near the edge of the pit. Initially, they are positioned at the bottom of the frame, close to the center, in the foreground. As the video progresses, the shot transitions to a wide shot, bringing the subjects more into view while maintaining their central positioning. The two individuals lean over the pit, their upper bodies now more visible as they look downward. The camera remains consistently above the subjects throughout, providing a top-down perspective. The pit stays in the center of the frame, serving as the focal point, with the subjects positioned around its edge. The overall scene retains its minimalistic quality, with the dark surroundings and earthy textures emphasizing the central action. The camera's fixed overhead angle ensures a clear view of the subjects' movements and positions relative to the pit.

Please note that the video features **salient human subjects**, so you should focus on describing the spatial framing and movements of them.
